text:
RELIGION

Mahabharatham: Rama Dikshithar, Sri Krishna Gana Sabha, T. Nagar, 6.30 p.m.

Gita: Satyavratananda Saraswati, Kesari HSS., Pondy Bazaar Extn., T. Nagar 6.30 p.m.; Ramana Swaroopananda, R-Block, 47/15, 15th St., Anna Nagar, 6.45 p.m.

Mandukya Upanishad: R. Manidravid, Sri Sankara Gurukulam, 8/20, C.P. Ramaswamy St., Abhiramapuram, 5 p.m.

Praboda Sudakaram: R. Krishnamurthy, Sri Sankara Gurukulam, 8/20, C.P. Ramaswamy St., Abhiramapuram, 6.45 p.m.

Thiruarutpa: Yuva Bharath, Sakthi Vinayagar Temple, P.T. Rajan Salai, K.K. Nagar, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

Department of Statistics – University of Madras: Valedictory of symposium on ‘Actuarial Science and Business Analyst’, Chepauk, 4.30 p.m.

Hindustan Institute of Technology & Science: Inauguration of Big Data Analytics training programme, Kelambakkam, 10.30 a.m.

S.A. Engineering College: Lecture on ‘Design of electrical machines’, Thiruverkadu, 10 a.m.

Murthuzaviya Charitable Hospital: Inauguration of ‘The Surgical Wing and Geriatic Care Services’, R51, 92nd St., Muthamizh Nagar 5th Block, Kodungaiyur, 5 p.m.

Quaide-Milleth College for Men (Shift II): College day and sports day, Medavakkam, 3 p.m.

Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan and Sri Krishna Sweets: Programme on ‘Uyirae Uravae’, Mylapore, 6.30 p.m.

Lions Club of Chennai Periamet: Meeting, YWCA of Madras International Guest House, 1086, Poonamallee High Rd., 6.31 p.m.

YMCA Pattimanram: Talk on ‘Poems of Thara Bharathy’, YMCA Esplanade, N.S.C. Bose Rd., 6 p.m.

Narcotics Anonymous: Meeting, Self Help Group, Community Service Center, Balfour Rd., Kilpauk, 7 p.m.
title: Chennai today
